title: Ebro In The Morning - Normani Joins The Gurus + New Music Friday
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 4/8/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez and the crew are in the studio discussing the premiere of the new Def Jam documentary "Mixtape," New Music, the SCOTUS, and Normani joins the gurus!

Get excited for the gurus to help solve your problems and get the latest news with Flashing Lights. All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

LISTEN TO "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923

Hot97.com -Tap In With TT | Hot97

Amazon Podcasts - https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/d3104cc7-b28e-4e25-9884-5946219d0be6/tap-in-with-tt

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/0a2g28v979wHIY0Vlnrjul?si=a91f5e2a4d254f6d

iHeart -Tap In With TT | iHeart

COMING SOON TO GOOGLE PODCASTS, TUNEIN, & STITCHER
